group_1.narration: The Memory Museum showed me@a familiar sight…

group_1.textCenter: (The sky…is so close…)

group_1.narration: …Yes. It was from when I had tried@to end my life for the first time.

group_1.textCenter: (The ground…is so far away…)
(If I were to fall from this height, I…)

group_1.narration: "I won't have to suffer anymore."@As soon as that realization came to me,@I found myself floating in midair,@in the wind, just like this…
But as the ground rushed up at me,@I didn't feel relief, but fear…
"I can grant you your wish."
And so I made my wish.
"I...I don't want to die!"
I still wanted to live…
After I became a Magical Girl, Kyubey taught me@about the existence of Witches…@The Seeds of Calamity.
Yes… That's when I learned that people hurt@each other because of the Witch's curse.

group_1.textLeft: If that's true...@If that's true, then I...
I-I'll do it!@As a Magical Girl, I'll do all I can!
To help build a kind world...where@people don't hurt each other!
I-I'm going to live!@[chara:302500:lipSynch_0][wait:2.0][chara:302500:cheek_1][chara:302500:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:302500:lipSynch_1]And I'm going to fight these Witches!

group_1.narration: Looking back on it,@I still had hope.
I believed if I could defeat all of the Witches,@people would stop hurting each other.
But the world isn't as simple as that…
I soon realized that eliminating all of@the Witches in the world would still not@remove malice from people's hearts.

group_1.textCenter: (If I can't help get rid of all this@irrational pain in the world...)
I can't...@I don't want to live anymore...

group_1.narration: With the world leaving me in despair,@it didn't take take much time for me@to decide to commit suicide@a second time…

group_1.textCenter: Don't!

group_1.narration: But that was when Rika saved me…

group_1.textCenter: (...A memory from what I had just started@as a Magical Girl…)
(I can't say it's a fond memory…but…)
(I think there must have been some@meaning in looking back on it…)
Alright, next week, your career path survey@will be due.
If you plan on continuing into high school, you're@not just limited to the standard curriculum.
You should look into other course options as well.
By exploring your options, you'll get a better idea@of what you want to do in the future.
(...A career survey. I'm planning on continuing@with the general curriculum,)
(but I haven't…given any thought to what@I want to do in the future…)
(I've…never had a dream to follow…)

group_1.narration: "To help build a kind world...@Where people don't hurt each other!"

group_1.textCenter: …[wait:0.8][chara:302501:lipSynch_1]My ideal…

group_1.narration: I had an ideal once,@but it never came to pass...
I wanted to defeat all of the Witches@and create a world where people@don't hurt each other.

group_1.textCenter: (By coming to the Memory Museum and@remembering how I felt back then,)
(I thought it might spark a realization@for what I want to do, but…)
(...I still don't know.)

group_1.narration: On that second attempt…she saved me…@Rika gave me kindness…@and a place where I belonged.
And now I want to live…@That's for sure…

group_1.textCenter: (But…at the very beginning…?)
(I had nothing. I was empty…)
(But even so, without any hesitation…@I wished to live…?)
(...This is only leaving me with more questions@than answers…)
